meanings.definition: Stylish or fashionable in a sophisticated way.
meanings.sent1: She wore the chicest dress to the party, turning heads with her elegant style.
meanings.sent2: The chicest trends in fashion often come from famous designers.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat tried to look chicest by wearing a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: Her chicest outfit was like a work of art, blending colors and textures perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The chicest models on the runway made the audience gasp in admiration.

meanings.sent1: In the fashion world, she was known as the chicest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The chicest of the celebrities always graced the covers of magazines.
meanings.sent3: The chicest at the party won the 'Best Dressed' award with ease.
meanings.sent4: Being the chicest in town was like holding a crown of style and elegance.
meanings.sent5: Everyone aspired to be the chicest, setting trends and inspiring others.
